In that time. This is the time of the events identified in the previous six verses.

shall the present be brought unto the Lord of hosts. These are the gifts of homage that Israel will bring to the Lord after her restoration. The gifts may be no less than the state of purity and righteousness of the Saints who have made the Atonement effective in their lives.

a people scattered and peeled…whose land the rivers have spoiled. The words in 18:2 are repeated here for emphasis but with the added phrase to the place of the name of the Lord of hosts, the mount Zion, a reference to the temple.
